mapper.sql: id, `name`, description, imgurl, goodratio, buy_price, sell_price, inventory, sales, `status`, create_time, P_type
mapper.insert:
insert into com_product
id,
`name`,
description,
imgurl,
goodratio,
buy_price,
sell_price,
inventory,
sales,
`status`,
create_time,
P_type,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodratio,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},

mapper.update:
update com_product
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imgurl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodratio = #{goodratio,jdbcType=INTEGER},
buy_price = #{buyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sell_price = #{sellPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sales = #{sales,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
P_type = #{pType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update com_product set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imgurl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodratio = #{goodratio,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buy_price = #{buyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sell_price = #{sellPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, P_type = #{pType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from com_product cp where (select count(distinct (cp2.sales)) from com_product cp2 where cp2.P_type = cp.P_type and cp2.sales > cp.sales) < #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by P_type,cp.sales desc

select
from com_product where `name` like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER}
